DOC.brief_summary: Very study evaluate effect aleurone-enriched grain cardiovascular risk factor . Price et al . ( 2010 ) show 4-week supplementation aleurone-enriched product ( 27 g/day aleurone ) increase betaine concentration plasma whereas reduce homocysteine LDL-cholesterol level . Interestingly , aleurone effect total antioxidant status endothelial function , whereas improvement C-reactive protein observe ( Price RK et al , 2012 ) . It know whether consumption 27g/day aleurone-enriched product higher ferulic acid biodisponibility long time treatment could influence parameter individual metabolic syndrome . Noteworthy , study investigate effect aleurone-enriched product fast postprandial glycemic homeostasis lipid metabolism . In addition , mechanism aleurone may act vivo still unknown . The aim study investigate whether 8 week supplementation aleurone-enriched product may influence glucose lipid metabolism , incretin hormone level , satiety , inflammation , oxidative stress endothelial function overweight/obese subject high cardiovascular risk .
